alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 11:54PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pushmataha and southwestern Le Flore Counties through 1230 AM CST... At 1154 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Nashoba, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Whitesboro... Octavia... Muse... Nashoba... Honobia... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for southeastern Oklahoma.
